Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ] Application Guide Application Guide [PDF ]

Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:56:30 UTC – Details)


Quick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a powerful car phone mount magnetic system for conveniently mounting your smartphone, cell phone or larger smart devices to the dashboard in your vehicle, office, workshop, boat or RV. Lock your cell phone or device in place with this Scosche dash mount car holder featuring a 4-Axis adjustable ball joint neck with lock for optimal viewing at any angle. The integrated cable clips let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the magnetic phone car mount to keep cables from obstructing your view. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your phone magnet near the phone magnetic mount surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful N50 neodymium magnets are very strong magnetic car phone mounts and are still 100% safe for modern smartphones and devices. The low-profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the automotive grade base to ensure optimal holding power. Compliment your cell phone automobile accessories with this car phone holder.
Magnetic Phone Holder – Comes with powerful Rare-Earth neodymium phone magnets that provide a secure grip to your iPhone, Android or Tablet. 100% mobile device safe. Simply stick the car mount magnet to the back of your phone case for a secure magnet hold.
Optimal Viewing – With 4-axis, 360-degree adjustable head and enhanced soft touch rubber lock-nut, this magnetic car mount allows viewing from any angle. Provides a great hands free experience.
Convenient Design – Integrated cable clip secures the charging cable to our car cell phone holder for a clean mount. The cradle-free design permits safe, easy one-handed use and access to all controls and ports.
Dashboard Accessories Included – phone mount, MagicPlates, protective film and user manual
Buy with Confidence – Backed by Scosche’s Lifetime Tech Support and 3-year Warranty

Secure this mount onto any firm, flat and clean surface area

Does not interfere with wireless charging when using the proper MagicPlate placement

The heat resistant automotive grade mounting base will safely secure a Smartphone in your car, home or office

Read more





Dashboard Mount
Dashboard Mount

Dash/Vent Mount Kit

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $38.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

Advantage :
1. 180° flip camera
2. Easy to use and carry
3. With 11 funny frames
4. Come with 8GB SD card

Prysyedawn Kids Phone

In order to stimulate children’s desire for exploration and interest in photography, we upgraded the Prysyedawn phone with a new high-definition 180° flip camera configuration. Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

Specifications :
Display Screen: 2 inch
Battery Capacity: 600mAh
Charging Time: 2-3 Hours
Charging Cable: USB Type-C cable
Support 3.5mm Headphone Jack
System Languages: 20 languages are supported. e.g. English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Portuguese, etc.

Cute Stickers and Frames

This toddler phone can be flipped 180° to take cute photos. The sticker camera with 11 cute stickers can choose. Let your little girls get creative by taking photos and the lifetime more interesting.

Wallpapers & Desktop

10 wallpapers, 5 styles of desktop to choose from. Let your child experience the joy of different wallpapers.

Alarm Clock

This phone can teach kids to follow a schedule and develop autonomy by setting alarms to do homework, brush teeth, or go to bed. (only set 4 alarms)

Flashlight

Let the child from being scared when they are in the dark. (Be careful when using the flashlight, Don’t point the light directly at people or animals, as it may cause eye damage.)

4 Funny Puzzle Games

4 Interesting learning games that can develop children’s intelligence and exercise their ability to react and think.

Perfect Gift for Kids Ages 3-6

Kids like taking selfies, videos, large Storage to meet the needs of kids. This Phone toy can store thousands of photos, and kids can recall everything he has recorded! At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

Notice:

1. Do not disassemble the battery.

2. Use the USB cable to connect to the computer. The phone will display charging and the computer will read the disk. You can download photos or music.

3. For adding new music, please confirm the downloaded music is in MP3 format.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you don’t need to buy a SIM card for this.

【Upgraded Toddler Cell Phone】Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Equipped with auto Focus, 8.0 Mega pixels and 1080P Video. Greatly improved the definition of photos. With Big head sticker shooting, children can take photos with frames, leave some hilarious photos with family or friends. And it has a high-quality speaker that can support a 3.5mm headphone jack. It is good for children to learn and listen to music.
【180° Flip Camera】Upgraded to flip-camera configuration, Easy to take selfies. Just open the switch key to enjoy the fun of taking photos. With 10 wallpapers and 5 desktops, kids can switch between their favorite wallpapers. Kids music player Includes a portable lanyard hang, easy to carry and move. Includes a video recorder, Alarm clock, game, and voice recorder for more creative ways to play.
【Powerful Battery Life】Continuously taking photos or listening to music for 1-2 hours after fully charged! Come with 1*USB Type-C cable & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!
【Safe & Durable Shockproof】This toddler music player is used high quality non-toxic soft plastic, more safe and comfortable for children’s skin. The shockproof shell provides effective anti-fall protection.
【Great Gift for Kids】Perfect birthday, Christmas, festival, and holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3~6. Children love taking photo with extremely cute cell phone. Simply capture scene or animals on nature with family, experience the fun from nature. In addition, your child will have their first own fake phone, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.






Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

  • Advantage :
  • 1. 180° flip camera
  • 2. Easy to use and carry
  • 3. With 11 funny frames
  • 4. Come with 8GB SD card

Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you don’t need to buy a SIM card for this.

The Tile Starter Pack is an easy way to keep track of all the things you can’t live without. Mate is a versatile tracker that easily attaches to everyday must-haves likes keys, backpacks, wallets, and more. It has up to 250 ft Bluetooth range and a 3-year non-replaceable battery. Slim, Tile’s thinnest tracker, easily slides into your wallet, luggage tag, or a book. It has a 200 ft Bluetooth range and 3-year non-replaceable battery. Both Mate and Slim are water-resistant, work with Android and Apple® devices, have voice-assisted finding with Alexa, Google and Siri, and can be used to ring your phone if it ever gets lost.
TRACKER FOR KEYS, WALLETS AND MORE: Get started with our Mate and Slim to help you easily find what you can’t live without like your keys and wallet. Keep track of more for less with our multi-packs or give them to your friends and family as a gift.
FIND NEARBY — Use the Tile app to ring your Tile when it’s within Bluetooth range, or ask your Smart Home device to find it for you.
FIND FAR AWAY — When outside of Bluetooth range, use the Tile app to view your Tile’s most recent location on a map.
FIND YOUR PHONE- Double press the button on your Tile to make your phone ring, even when it’s on silent.
NOTIFY WHEN FOUND — Enlist the secure and anonymous help of the Tile Network to help find your things. If your lost Tile is found, If your Tile is lost, add your contact information so you can be reached when someone scans the QR code on your lost Tile.
ANDROID, IOS & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE – Find your things with the free Tile app on both iOS and Android devices. Tile also works with Amazon Alexa, Hey Google and Siri
TECH SPECS: Water-Resistant (IP67 rated), Up to 3-year non-replaceable battery, Up to 250 ft / 76 m Bluetooth range
UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM PLAN: Get proactive Smart Alert notifications when you leave something behind, and with Item Reimbursement, if we can’t find your Tiled item, we reimburse you.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

LISEN electronic accessory stand helps us break the bad habit of looking down at the phone for a long time

Most comfortable height for the neck, shoulders and neck designed by German scientists according to ergonomics
Preserving a head-up or slightly upward gaze while using electronic devices can successfully avoid development of “text neck”
This new phone stand that is higher than the triangular phone base will be your most valuable product

LISEN New Stand Recommend

TALLER AND MORE PHOTOGENIC STAND, HELP TO CORRECT THE “TEXT NECK”: This cell phone stand holder is in accordance with ergonomic design. Providing you comfortable viewing angle which helps to fix your posture and reduce neck & back strain. The height can be easily adjusted between 7.1in-8.5in(1.4in adjustable range), the angle is adjustable between 5°~85°
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: [No bent & tangling & tip over worries] when using while charging. Due to bent cable, the low phone dock maybe fall over. LISEN stylish adjustable phone holder for desk has a reserved charging hole design, supports cable management, [No bent & tangling & tip over worries]. This phone pad will not cover the subtitle when you watch the video
WEIGHTED ANTI-SLIP BASE: This cell phone stand for desk is equipped with a weighted base and an aluminum alloy rod. Therefore, this iPhone stand holder is stable enough to support all smartphones or small tablets, such as 2021 iPad Mini, iPhone 14 pro max 13 Pro/13 Mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/iPhone 11/11 Pro/Max/X/MAX/XR/8/8P, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, Note 10/9/8/Plus, S10/S9/S8, Kindel, Switch, iPad Mini,iPad Air, etc.We recommend the most stable compatible device size is 4-10 inchs
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The pad back and the bottom of this cell phone stand are fully covered by anti-skid silicone, which LISEN iPad stand holder can provide maximum protection for your device from any scratches and slides, grips friendly
WE CARE ABOUT YOU: If the product arrives broken, or get broken within 365 days, please directly contact LISEN for satisfied solution. Any other problem like could not tighten the screw, please also contact us. We sincerely care about every customer’s shopping experience! (Product including: phone stand*1, screw*1, hexagon screwdriver*1, specification*1)






LISEN electronic Accessories stand help to save the bad habit that we are spending more and more time bow head to looking on our mobile phones

  • Choosing LISEN electronic accessories stand, the most suitable height designed by German scientists based on ergonomic shoulder and neck
  • As long as you insist on using it for 1 hour a day, Keep hold head looking up at electronic devices
  • Can effectively alleviate the formation of our “text neck”, help our family enjoy the joy of playing with electronic devices while staying healthy
  • This new style mobile electronic stand will be your most valuable product, higher than triangular cell phone dock, Save you from the bad habit of head down playing phone!

Questions & Answers

Q1: Is this cell phone stands stable for a big phone and tablets?

Answer: Yes. this phone holder can support all cell phones. In addition, LISEN iPhone stand for desk can also stably adapt to small tablets less than 10 inchs, like 2021 iPad mini etc.

Q2: How tall is this cell phone stand holder?

Answer: The height of this desk phone stand is 1.4 inches adjustable, is flush with the face or slightly higher, so that you can be more calm and elegant during video calls.




Thoughtful Storage Base

Aesthetics of desk fashion With a storage base design, this iPhone stand holder can help to organize small things, such as airphones, rings, clips to avoid losing them.

Cable Organizer & Charging Hole

Featured with reserved charging hole and cable organizer circle, this cell phone holder stand is convenient for charging, and make your desk neat and tidy. No worry with cable tangling.

Full Covered Silicone Pad

Fully covered by soft silicone pad (back and feet), it can protect devices from scratch while 4 to 10 inch devices sitting comfortably. And it can support up to 0.53 inch thick phones with case.

NOTE: NOT RECOMMENDED TO USE THE EXTRA DASHBOARD PAD FOR WINDSHIELD MOUNTING
Broad Vision: Qifutan cell phone car mount features a 16cm/6.2in aluminum long gooseneck that sends your phone much closer to you. It can be mounted on the dashboard or windshield firmly. Most importantly, you can bend it in every direction to avoid obstructing the view
Secure Steady Installation: Qifutan car mount for iphone 13/12/11 features an extra-strong vacuum suction cup with a layer of super sticky gel, a locking lever, and an anti-shake stabilizer. It sticks securely and easily on the dashboard or most flat surfaces and removes the phone car mount without leaving any nasty marks. (Note: use warm water to wash the car holder’s suction cup if the surface is dirty or it can not stick firmly, then let it air dry.)
One-Hand Operation: Press the button on the lower back of the car mobile phone holder to take out your phone, and press the back edge of the clamping arms to secure your phone with one hand. Make your operation more fluently. Fit well for the smartphone which’s the width between 4”-7”in and the most thickness
Smooth Contact: The car phone mount is padded with multiple soft silicone pads to avoid scratching your smartphone or other devices. Perfect choice for most cars, vehicle, pickup trucks, SUVs, trucks, taxis; a good assistant for Uber, Lyft drivers
Ideal Viewing Angle: The car phone mount features a 360° rotating ball joint that allows you to switch it from portrait to landscape view quickly, for getting the best viewing angle. It is favorable for navigation and sending and receiving phone calls. You can enjoy a more convenient and secure drive
